name: Totally Accurate Platformer
description:
Hello! I am Kik-Dev. I am 15 years old and I live in Germany but I am originally from Hungary. In the past 4-5 Months i have been working on and off on this Project and I am kind of proud how it turned out. My goal is to finish it and maybe make some Money of it. I wanted to upload my Game here to get some Feedback on whats missing or what to remove.

Sincerley Kik-Dev ;)
